meanings.definition: A type of identification card or document.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my cedulas in my wallet.
meanings.sent2: The security guard asked to see my cedulas before letting me in.
meanings.sent3: My cedulas decided to play hide and seek in my bag today!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was her cedulas, revealing her true identity.
meanings.sent5: The cedulas fluttered in the wind, revealing its importance.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'cedula', a term used in some Spanish-speaking countries for a tax or financial document.
meanings.sent1: The accountant filed all the cedulas for the year.
meanings.sent2: In Spain, they require various cedulas for different transactions.
meanings.sent3: The cedulas were having a party in the filing cabinet!
meanings.sent4: The cedulas piled up like mountains on his desk.
meanings.sent5: The cedulas whispered secrets of financial matters.
